// ** React Imports import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Row, Col, Card, Label, Input, Modal, Button, CardBody, CardText, CardTitle, ModalBody, InputGroup, ModalHeader, InputGroupText } from 'reactstrap' // ** Icons Imports import { Award, Gift, MessageSquare, Clipboard, Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin } from 'react-feather' const data = [ { icon: , title: 'Send Invitation ü§üüèª', subtitle: 'Send your referral link to your friend' }, { icon: , title: 'Registration üë©üèª‚Äçüíª', subtitle: 'Let them register to our services' }, { icon: , title: 'Free Trial üéâ', subtitle: 'Your friend will get 30 days free trial' } ] const ReferEarnModal = () => { // ** State const [show, setShow] = useState(false) return ( Refer & Earn Use Refer & Earn modal to encourage your exiting customers refer their friends & colleague. setShow(!show)} className='modal-dialog-centered modal-refer-earn modal-lg'> setShow(!show)}>

Refer & Earn

Invite your friend to vuexy, if they sign up, you and
your friend will get 30 days free trial

{data.map((item, index) => { return (
{item.icon}
{item.title}

{item.subtitle}

) })}

e.preventDefault()}>

e.preventDefault()}> e.preventDefault()}> Copy Link
) } export default ReferEarnModal
